head.title: Coronado's A+ Unveiling - Nogales Unified School District #1

td.a: Colgate named new Nogales High School principal
Eliza Lopez honored as an outstanding teacher
NUSD Supt. and Coronado Principal Honored
Mitchell teacher selected as outstanding educator
NHS Mariachi Apache@ Phoenix AESA Conference
Desert Shadows Teacher Debbie Condes Honored

div.img:
On Wed, Oct 2, 2019 We had theFrancisco Vasquez de Coronado A+ Unveiling Ceremony.
Congratulations to all Coronado Staff and Community.
